title: Can anyone identify this chunky font?
tags: can anyone identify this chunky font?
author: NeonPurple

comments.content:
it's not "chunky" it's script.  
 [Monotype Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20140824194447/http:/www.fonts.com/font/adobe/monotype-script/bold).

it would be helpful if you cropped the images so there was not so much to scroll through. i think you'll get better response.
